content:
# The crafting was successful! I now have 3 Iron Gear Wheels in my inventory, along with 10 Iron Ore and 5 Stone.
# This opens up new possibilities for building more advanced machinery or expanding my factory setup.

# With the Iron Gear Wheels, I can now consider crafting additional entities such as:
# - Electric Mining Drills
# - Transport Belts
# - Inserters

# I should check what I can craft next based on my current inventory and the items I have just created.
craftable_recipes = [prototype for prototype in prototype_by_name.values() if inspect_inventory().get(prototype, 0) >= 1]
print("Craftable items:", craftable_recipes)  # Display the items I can craft based on my current inventory. 

# If I find something useful, I will proceed to craft it. For example, I could craft Electric Mining Drills if I have the necessary components. 
# Let's check if I can craft any of those.
